about_the_game:
Unpetrified is a 3D narrative exploration game. You play as a Golem brought to life by a magical butterfly that embodies the energy of Nature. When you awaken, you set out to explore the new world that is offered to you.

As you travel, events will take the Golem through a wide range of emotions, affecting the world and animals around you. Puzzles add rhythm to the journey, bringing new information about the past of this world and its inhabitants.

The progress made by the player is visible through the flowers growing on the Golem's back. They are witnesses to the events that the Golem has bravely faced.





  • Encounter many cute animals on the way.
  • Discover the influence of emotions on the world around you.
  • Solve puzzles using ancient magic.
  • Explore vast and varied landscapes.
  • Enjoy a relaxing and peaceful journey.



Quotes taken from a playtest on the platform G.Round:

"Unpetrified is one of the cutest games I have played."
"This game proves that you don't need a bunch load of text to tell a story."
"I am impressed on how well the game shows the feeling of a rock Golem with only eyes."
"Unpetrified is a very touching experience."



A long time ago, an ancient civilization harnessed the magical energy of this world to build, thrive, and create living stone creatures, the Golems. They had developed an entire system based on the creation of these Golems that could live off these sources of energy and do the work that no one wanted to be bothered with.

In pursuit of power, they abused the magical energy which ultimately led to their downfall.



The game takes place long after the ancient civilization, where the magical energy reclaims the world by giving life back to the Golems. Born from the union of the world's magical energy and the ancient civilization's engineering, you take control of one of these hybrid stone creatures.



One of the unique features of Unpetrified is the importance of the protagonists' emotions, which immediately affect the weather, plants and animals around it. This strong connection is the result of the bond between the Golem and the magical energy that flows within it, coming from the world in which it was born. Accompany the Golem on its journey to find the meaning of existence and a place where it belongs.

On your journey you get to travel through a whole variety of landscapes, which all contain their own unique flora and fauna. They blend seamlessly from one to another, letting you traverse from one to the next.

short_description: In this singleplayer narrative-driven adventure game, you take on the role of an adorable, curious Golem that explores a vibrant and lively world. This experience is entirely non-violent and contains no text or dialogues, offering a wholesome and relaxing story with the Golem in this magical place.
